name: Skipper & Skeeto - The Shadow of Mr. Shade
summary:
The fourth game in a series of point-and-click games. Set in a factory of mister Shade. 
 
Magnus and Mia can walk, climb, jump, push and pull. You play alternately Mia and Magnus through 4 chapters. Click on mosquito or Alpha for help. Many new exciting characters. More than 200 tasks and puzzles. Learn as you play - facts about plastic, oil, glass and many everyday objects.
storyline: The stampede from the evil Mr. Shade leads Magnus the mosquito and Mia accidentally to the middle of Shade's factory. You now need to help them through the factory before Mr. Shade comes. But beware! For everywhere are lurking devious traps, hot-tempered robots, and mechanical guard spiders. Fortunately, they meet a cute robot Alpha, who becomes their friend in need!

alternative_names.name: Manu ja Matti - Herra Varjon salaisuus
